fast3d.fragment

Class FragmentShaderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.fragment.FragmentShaderManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultFragmentShaderManager

    public abstract class FragmentShaderManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    a fragment shader manager combines all fragment shader threads used to render one frame
    Author:
    Tim Trense

      • FragmentShaderManager

        public FragmentShaderManager(Universe uni,
                             int threadcount)
        constructs a new shader manager
        Parameters:
        uni - the universe to render
        threadcount - the count of shader to split the process up to, to accelerate it

        public double getProgress()
